column4: can someone help me out here....i know that glxgears is not a benchmarking tool....but im installing ati's fglrx 8.29.6 drivers from ati.com and everything seemed to go ok, fglrxinfo works fine, but glxgears is showing like 200fps, i have an athlon64 4000+ 1 gig ram, ati x600, i should be getting like 2000-3000
well my 5 year old machine with an fx5500 gets 2700fps
to be honest youd be better off probably with that card instead of the ati..
ati is in my laptop, nvidia in my desktop
